hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export WORK_DIR=`pwd` export PATH=/sbin:$PATH cd $WORK_DIR
sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y autoconf automake bzip2 cyrus-sasl-devel flex freetype2-devel gawk gcc gcc-c++ gdbm-devel git \ gmp-devel groff libbz2-devel libdb-4_5-devel libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libxml2-devel libxslt-devel make \ pkg-config pcre-devel readline-devel tar unixODBC-devel vim wget xorg-x11-libXpm-devel xz zlib-devel network-autoconfig sysconfig wget-openssl1
cd $WORK_DIR wget http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/libtool/libtool-2.4.6.tar.gz tar -xvf libtool-2.4.6.tar.gz cd libtool-2.4.6 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local && make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/bison/bison-2.7.1.tar.gz tar zxf bison-2.7.1.tar.gz cd bison-2.7.1 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local && make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.7/cmake-3.7.2.tar.gz tar xzf cmake-3.7.2.tar.gz cd cmake-3.7.2 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local make sudo make install export PATH=/usr/local/cmake/bin:$PATH cmake --version
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://www.openssl.org/source/old/fips/openssl-fips-2.0.13.tar.gz tar zxf openssl-fips-2.0.13.tar.gz cd openssl-fips-2.0.13 ./config no-asm && make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://www.openssl.org/source/old/1.0.2/openssl-1.0.2j.tar.gz tar zxf openssl-1.0.2j.tar.gz cd openssl-1.0.2j ./config fips --prefix=/usr/local --openssldir=/usr/local/etc shared zlib make depend && make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget http://www.openldap.org/software/download/OpenLDAP/openldap-release/openldap-2.4.41.tgz tar zxf openldap-2.4.41.tgz cd openldap-2.4.41 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --sysconfdir=/usr/local/etc --disable-slapd make depend && make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR git clone git://github.com/curl/curl.git cd curl git checkout curl-7_52_1 ./buildconf ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --with-ssl make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://sourceforge.net/projects/net-snmp/files/net-snmp/5.7.3/net-snmp-5.7.3.tar.gz --no-check-certificate tar zxf net-snmp-5.7.3.tar.gz cd net-snmp-5.7.3 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --with-perl-modules --disable-agent --with-default-snmp-version="3" --with-sys-contact="@@no.where" --with-sys-location="Unknown" --with-logfile="/var/log/snmpd.log" --with-persistent-directory="/var/net-snmp" make && sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://ftp.postgresql.org/pub/source/v9.4.11/postgresql-9.4.11.tar.gz tar zxf postgresql-9.4.11.tar.gz cd postgresql-9.4.11 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --enable-thread-safety make && sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://downloads.mysql.com/archives/get/file/mysql-5.6.38.tar.gz tar zxf mysql-5.6.38.tar.gz cd mysql-5.6.38 cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local -DINSTALL_INCLUDEDIR=/usr/local/include/mysql -DSYSCONFDIR=/usr/local/etc/mysql -DWITHOUT_SERVER=ON -DWITH_SSL=system make && sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR git clone git://github.com/php/php-src.git cd php-src git checkout tags/php-7.1.2
cd $WORK_DIR wget http://sourceforge.net/projects/mcrypt/files/Libmcrypt/2.5.8/libmcrypt-2.5.8.tar.gz tar -xzvf libmcrypt-2.5.8.tar.gz cd libmcrypt-2.5.8 ./configure make sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR wget http://download.icu-project.org/files/icu4c/58.2/icu4c-58_2-src.tgz tar zxf icu4c-58_2-src.tgz cd icu/source ./configure --prefix=/usr/local && make sudo make install
sudo zypper install -y libexpat-devel cd $WORK_DIR wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/httpd/httpd-2.4.25.tar.gz tar zxf httpd-2.4.25.tar.gz cd httpd-2.4.25/srclib git clone git://github.com/apache/apr.git cd apr ./buildconf ./configure --prefix=/usr/local make && sudo make install cd $WORK_DIR/httpd-2.4.25 ./buildconf ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --enable-authnz-fcgi --enable-mods-shared="all cgi" --enable-mpms-shared=all --with-ssl make && sudo make install sudo chown -R wwwrun:www /srv/www
cd $WORK_DIR/php-src ./buildconf --force ./configure --datadir=/usr/local/share/php --localstatedir=/var --mandir=/usr/local/share/man --prefix=/usr/local --sysconfdir=/usr/local/etc --enable-bcmath --enable-calendar --enable-ctype --with-curl --enable-dba=shared --enable-exif --enable-filter --enable-flatfile --enable-fpm --enable-ftp --enable-gd-native-ttf --enable-inifile --enable-intl --enable-mbstring --enable-mysqlnd --enable-opcache --enable-pcntl --enable-shmop --enable-simplexml --enable-sockets --enable-sysvsem --enable-sysvshm --enable-sysvmsg --enable-xmlreader --enable-xmlwriter --enable-zend-signals --enable-zip --disable-phpdbg --disable-phpdbg-webhelper --with-apxs2=/usr/local/bin/apxs --with-bz2 --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/etc --with-config-file-scan-dir=/usr/local/etc/conf.d --with-fpm-group=www --with-fpm-user=wwwrun --with-freetype-dir --with-gd --with-gdbm --with-gettext --with-gmp --with-iconv --with-jpeg-dir --with-kerberos --with-ldap --with-ldap-sasl --with-mcrypt --with-mysql-sock=/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock --with-mysqli=mysqlnd --with-openssl --with-pcre-regex --with-pdo-mysql=mysqlnd --with-pdo-odbc=unixODBC,/usr --with-pdo-pgsql --with-pdo-sqlite --with-pgsql --with-png-dir --with-readline --with-snmp --with-sqlite3 --with-unixODBC=/usr --with-xpm-dir=/usr --with-xsl --with-zlib --without-pcre-jit
make clean make -j$(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor | wc -l)
make test #(**NOTE:There are few test case failures which are also observed on Intel x86 platform. These failures can be ignored.)
sudo make install sudo install -m644 php.ini-production /usr/local/etc/php.ini sudo sed -i 's@php/includes"@&\ninclude_path = ".:/usr/local/lib/php"@' /usr/local/etc/php.ini
php -v
#Configure PHP # PHP-FPM #Modify the file /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default to set php-fpm pid sudo cp /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default.orig sudo sed -i '17d' /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default sudo sed -i "17i pid = run/php-fpm.pid" /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default
sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
cp $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in.orig sudo sed -i '13d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "13i prefix=/usr/local" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in
sudo sed -i '14d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "14i exec_prefix=/usr/local" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i '16d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "16i php_fpm_BIN=/usr/local/sbin/php-fpm" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i '17d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "17i php_fpm_CONF=/usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i '18d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "18i php_fpm_PID=/var/run/php-fpm.pid" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in
sudo cp $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in /etc/init.d/php-fpm sudo chmod 755 /etc/init.d/php-fpm sudo chkconfig php-fpm on sudo /etc/init.d/php-fpm start
#Zend OPcache #Modify the file /usr/local/etc/php.ini to enable Zend OPcache: sudo cp /usr/local/etc/php.ini /usr/local/etc/php.ini.orig sudo sed -i "1784i zend_extension=opcache.so" /usr/local/etc/php.ini
php -v
if php -v | grep "Zend OPcache v7.1.2"; then echo "Done"
else exit 1 fi
cd $WORK_DIR sudo chmod 766 /usr/local/conf/httpd.conf sudo cp /usr/local/conf/httpd.conf /usr/local/conf/httpd.conf.ori cd /usr/local/conf/ sudo sed -i '149d' httpd.conf sudo sed -i "149i #LoadModule mpm_event_module modules/mod_mpm_event.so" httpd.conf sudo sed -i '150d' httpd.conf sudo sed -i "150i LoadModule mpm_prefork_module modules/mod_mpm_prefork.so" httpd.conf sudo sed -i "177i </FilesMatch>" httpd.conf sudo sed -i "177i \ \SetHandler application/x-httpd-php" httpd.conf sudo sed -i "177i <FilesMatch \.php$>" httpd.conf
sudo sed -i '190d' httpd.conf sudo sed -i "190i User wwwrun" httpd.conf sudo sed -i '191d' httpd.conf sudo sed -i "191i Group www" httpd.conf
sudo sed -i '245d' httpd.conf
sudo sed -i '245i DocumentRoot "/srv/www/htdocs"' httpd.conf
sudo sed -i '246d' httpd.conf sudo sed -i '246i <Directory "/srv/www/htdocs">' httpd.conf
cd $WORK_DIR sudo /usr/local/bin/apachectl -k start
cd /srv/www/htdocs sudo touch testphp.php
sudo chmod 766 testphp.php sudo echo -e "<?php" >> testphp.php sudo echo -e "phpinfo();" >> testphp.php sudo echo -e "?>" >> testphp.php
cat -n testphp.php
sudo /usr/local/bin/apachectl -k stop sudo /usr/local/bin/apachectl -k start sleep 3m
wget -O - http://127.0.0.1:80/testphp.php
